PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-12502013-11-21,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActFirearms Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Firearms Marking Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FIREARMS MARKING REGULATIONS in order to (1) defer the coming into force date of the Regulations until December 1, 2015; and (2) allow the Government to consult broadly with a wide-range of stakeholders.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2013-0203 Publication Date: 2013-12-04
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Firearms Marking Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the FIREARMS MARKING REGULATIONS in order to (1) defer the coming into force date of the Regulations until December 1, 2015; and (2) allow the Government to consult broadly with a wide-range of stakeholders.
